title: Expert Course on Narrative-Based Hypertext Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate-level expertise in the relevant job field (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: A Course to Enhance Hypertext-Based Instructional Design Capabilities for Science Professionals, Focusing on Personalized Content Development and Problem-Solving Scenario Construction

learning_goals: Learners can apply a hypertext design framework that converts job-related scientific content into narrative structures
Learners can implement interactive story components based on problem-solving scenarios with over 80% accuracy
Learners can incorporate four core design principles—learner motivation, navigation, contextualization of information, etc.—into project-based assessments

resources: LMS platform (with built-in hypertext authoring tool)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
